eu.trentorise.smartcampus.osm.android.bonuspack.routing

Class GoogleRoadManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.trentorise.smartcampus.osm.android.bonuspack.routing.RoadManager
      • eu.trentorise.smartcampus.osm.android.bonuspack.routing.GoogleRoadManager

  • public class GoogleRoadManager
extends RoadManager
    class to get a route between a start and a destination point, going through a list of waypoints.
    https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/directions/
    Note that displaying a route provided by Google on a non-Google map (like OSM) is not allowed by Google T&C.
    Author:
    M.Kergall
